Description.Text:
Safestay London Holland Park is ideally located in the heart of London, nestled within one of the capital's most prestigious parks. This stunning hostel consists of 3 buildings, including the East Wing of the park's original Jacobean building and surrounds our private courtyard garden.
The property has been fully refurbished to the high standards for which Safestay is renowned. We're ideally located to explore the many attractions London has to offer, with Notting Hill, Portobello Road and the Royal Albert Hall on our doorstep. With dormitories designed for large parties, some with triple bunks, and within a stone's throw from the Natural History and Science Museums Safestay London Holland Park is great for educational trips.
Safestay at Holland Park is one of London's flagship hostels, we've taken budget accommodation in the capital to new heights. With fantastic sociable spaces, including the private garden, lounge and pool room, we have everything to make your next trip to London the best ever.
***Please note that all rooms are bunk bedded dorms.***
